content.html: Remember: the cops will ignore you. They will ask you in roundabout ways. They're trying to get you to keep talking because then you're still agreeing to speak with them. "I request to speak with my court-appointed attorney." Stand your ground.
content.value:
Remember: the cops will ignore you. They will ask you in roundabout ways. They're trying to get you to keep talking because then you're still agreeing to speak with them.

"I request to speak with my court-appointed attorney." Stand your ground.
